description: A decentralized Todo List built on the Ethereum blockchain using Solidity for smart contracts and a React/NextJS frontend.
This project is a decentralized exchange (DEX) platform that enables users to swap tokens directly from a predefined token list (tokenList.json).
This project is inspired by Lamongan, an Indonesian street food. The purpose of this project is also to introduce Indonesian street food to the world through NFT.
Crowdfunding DApp Enables users to create and participate in crowdfunding campaigns using blockchain technology. Built with Next.js and the Thirdweb library.
